official_title: A bill to designate certain National Forest System lands in the State of Vermont for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System and for other purposes.

summary.text: Designates as components of the National Wilderness Preservation System the following lands in the Green Mountain National Forests in Vermont: (1) the Breadloaf Wilderness; (2) the Big Branch Wilderness; (3) the Lye Brook Wilderness Additions; and (4) the Woodford Wilderness.

titles.title: A bill to designate certain National Forest System lands in the State of Vermont for inclusion in the National Wilderness Preservation System and for other purposes.
